title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
– Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and 
Businesses) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 26th day of January
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering certain premise businesses) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 26th day january

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 296 of 2020) are amended by the substitution of the text set out in the 
Schedule for Part A of the Schedule to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [21] 3 

Regulation 2

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) to correct a typographical error in Part 
A of the Schedule.
